q_ch: Advanced裁剪组还未完成的裁剪任务是哪些顾客的订单？
q_en: Which customer orders are the cutting tasks that the Advanced Cutting Group has not yet completed?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the customer orders that the "Advanced Cutters" haven't completed yet. Here's what I found:

| Customer Name | Order Name  |
|---------------|-------------|
| John          | John_Pants  |

It seems like John is waiting for his "John_Pants" order to be completed by the Advanced Cutters. 🛠️👖 If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group named "Advanced Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT order_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (6);
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs from the order_product table using the order product IDs obtained in Step 2

steps.sql: SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_name FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE o.id IN (2);
steps.description: Retrieve the customer names and order names for the orders obtained in Step 3
